name: Scud Air Solutions
about: Scud Air Solutions is a premier flight school specializing in unique and exciting aviation training. With over 20 years of experience in the aviation industry, we offer a range of programs including tailwheel, backcountry, and aerobatic flying. Our instructors are dedicated to teaching stick and rudder skills, ensuring students experience the fun and thrill of aviation. From flying into backcountry locations to piloting aerobatic aircraft, we provide a comprehensive and enjoyable learning environment. Located at 3909 Airport Rd, Ste 481 in Ogden, UT, we are committed to making learning to fly an exhilarating and rewarding experience. Come and discover the excitement of aviation done right with Scud Air Solutions.
